material.twilight_construct.knightmetal.encyclopedia: Reduce movement speed but increase damage
material.twilight_construct.knightmetal.ranged: Reduce movement speed but increase damage
material.twilight_construct.knightmetal.armor: Reduce movement speed but reflect melee damage
material.twilight_construct.steeleaf.encyclopedia: Repairs itself when you hold some Steeleaf in your hands
material.twilight_construct.steeleaf.ranged: Repairs itself when you hold some Steeleaf in your hands
material.twilight_construct.steeleaf.armor: Repairs itself when you hold some Steeleaf in your hands

modifier.twilight_construct.twilight.description: Increase mining speed in Twilight Forest and increase attack damage outside of it
modifier.twilight_construct.mystic_growth.description: Slowly repairs itself in Twilight Forest
modifier.twilight_construct.synergy.description: Slowly repairs itself when you hold Steeleaf in your hands. The more you hold, the faster it repairs.
